techmeme.title: AI language translation was one of the most beneficial uses of AI during major global elections in 2024, and AI misinformation was not as catastrophic as feared (The Conversation)

A deep dive into Amazon's Trainium2, which shows the company is on a path to eventually provide competitive custom AI chips, especially for LLM inference (SemiAnalysis)
Intel interim co-CEO David Zinsner maintains Intel's financial forecast and says he expects the next CEO to have some capability around both foundry and product (Zaheer Kachwala/Reuters)
At the DealBook Summit, Sundar Pichai said he would love to do a side-by-side comparison of Google and Microsoft's AI models, and expressed optimism about Trump (Nico Grant/New York Times)
